long_description: The lightweight Burton Total Impact shorts build extra protection right into boys' clothing, so they can take on gnarly tricks and terrain without extra bulk and weight. Breathable d3o(R) Flo Impact padding in key areas helps reduce impact from falls on the hips and tailbone. DRYRIDE Ultrawick(TM) Birds Eye mesh fabric wicks moisture away to keep skin dry and comfortable.
